bt.data.range

Class ByteRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.data.range.ByteRange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Range<ByteRange>

    public class ByteRange
extends Object
implements Range<ByteRange>
    Binary data range.
    Since:
    1.3

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteRange(byte[] bytes)
      Create a binary range from a byte array.
      ByteRange(byte[] bytes, int offset, int limit)
      Create a binary range from a subrange of a byte array.
      ByteRange(ByteBuffer buffer)
      Create a binary range from a byte buffer.

      • ByteRange

        public ByteRange(byte[] bytes,
                 int offset,
                 int limit)
        Create a binary range from a subrange of a byte array.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Byte array
        offset - Offset in bytes, inclusive
        limit - Limit in bytes, exclusive; must not be larger than bytes.length
        Since:
        1.3
